channel.title: Tau Cannon went missing
channel.description:
After completing Questionable Ethics I realized that I no longer have the Tau Cannon, despite still picking up ammo for it (The little radiation boxes I assume?). Does the gun go missing once you hit Surface Tension?
edit: If I impulse 101 I have the gun and it is definitely the ammo for it that I am talking about. Why would the gun go missing? bug?

item.title: Tau Cannon went missing
item.dc:creator: andred
item.description:
Cant load back without playing through all of questionable ethics as I forgot to save apparently (Pretty sure I did save…not sure whats up with that). Just gave myself the weapon and called it a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Tau Cannon went missing
item.dc:creator: hajducek
item.description:
It’s probably a bug. Try reloading a save, or adding weapon by console. It should be something like

give weapon_tau

Read full topic
